title: Sonoma Valley
name: Gundlach Bundschu Winery
content: The second oldest winery in Sonoma Valley, Gundlach Bundschu (pronounced "Gun Lock Bun Shoe") is as famous for its wines as it is for it's events. Have a tasting, but also check out their website for special event such as their indie music festival, Shakespeare festival, and classical music series.
